definition: to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Judges should be impartial, sometimes even desensitised, to give a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 法官必须公平地，甚至撇开个人恶好去判决。

sentences.english: If politics is taken out of the picture, the situation is win-win.
sentences.chinese: 如果撇开政治的影响，这可以使个双赢的局面。

sentences.english: In New England, if we except a circle of Bostonians, this has been especially true.
sentences.chinese: 在新英格兰，撇开波士顿人的圈子不论。

sentences.english: Whether or not those desires can be satisfied is set aside.
sentences.chinese: 此类欲望是否能得到满足，我们暂且撇开不谈。

sentences.english: Theory aside, functionally there is no difference between these two styles of injection.
sentences.chinese: 如果把理论撇开，这两类注入的功能实际没有区别。

sentences.english: The square hurls alongside an eye according to Tong, don't calculate again see square Suo.
sentences.chinese: 方依彤撇开眼，不想再看到方索条。

sentences.english: Put aside this question for a moment.
With the high-level design points out of the way, let's take a closer look at the features.
sentences.chinese: 撇开较高层的设计不谈，我们仔细看看这些特性。

sentences.english: Safety concerns aside, room-temperature eggs perform better in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 撇开安全方面的考虑，室温鸡蛋做起来会更好吃。

sentences.english: They waived that problem aside last week.
sentences.chinese: 他们上周就把那个问题撇开不管了。

sentences.english: But again, just put those details aside.
sentences.chinese: 但话说回来，撇开这些细节不谈。

sentences.english: Less software means you put away the crystal ball.
sentences.chinese: 更少的软件意味着撇开水晶球。

sentences.english: One is to prepare the ground for a different coalition, without the Social Democrats.
sentences.chinese: 一是为撇开社民党，另建一个联盟做准备。

sentences.english: King William had thrown off his illness, and returned to his normal life.
sentences.chinese: 威廉王已经撇开了病榻，恢复了正常的生活。

sentences.english: You can say put aside the economic debates, taxation.
sentences.chinese: 你可以先撇开经济争论，征税等问题不谈。

sentences.english: Barring a major controversy or economic recession, Hu will probably end his term harmoniously.
sentences.chinese: 撇开争议和经济下滑不谈，胡将会和谐地结束任期。

definition: to throw out/to get rid of
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
needless to say/it goes without saying
